Limited Time Only!âââââââââââââââââââââââGlossary of World Religions is an application containing over 500 religion-related terms and jargons. This App is an excellent App for students interested in religious studies as well as those who want to know more about the world's different religions.The application is optimized for all Android devices running on OS 1.5 or above.âââââââââââââââââââââââFEATURESThis application has the following features:â User friendly interface to preview all terms in one viewâ Ability to bookmark selected term for easier referenceâ Cross-referencing links to other termâ A glossary terms search engineâ Offline browsingâââââââââââââââââââââââThis application is brought to you by Colakey LLC.
